config_version.$comment: So far, only version 1 is defined. (Version "0" is a mess and not worth writing a schema for.) When we have more than one defined version, we can look into the best way to make the rest of the schema dependent on the version.

mirrors.description: container for all added vendor repository mirrors

allOf.description: local path where the vendor content is placed, relative to the .braids.json file

url.description: remote URL of the vendor repository

path.description: path to a subdirectory or single file in the vendor tree (instead of the whole tree) to place at the specified local path

branch.description: branch name of the vendor repository to track

tag.description: tag name of the vendor repository to track

revision.description: commit ID of the vendor repository currently used by the mirror

allOf.$comment: At most one of "branch" and "tag". Technique from https://stackoverflow.com/a/33358676 .
